metadata.title: SanahujaDev | Your Digital Partner in Tenerife (WPO 99)
metadata.description: Leave the 'abandoned website' behind. As your Digital Partner in Tenerife, I create your website (WPO 99) and stay by your side to help you achieve your goals.

hero.h1_part2: who ACTUALLY Stands by You in Tenerife.
hero.h1_lead: No matter where you are stuck. I create your professional website (WPO 99), ultra-fast, and stay by your side so you can reach your goals. Because your success is my success.

problema.title: Fed up with the 'Abandoned Website'?
problema.content: It surely sounds familiar: developers who disappear, slow websites (WPO 40-50) that don't bring in clients, and you, alone in the middle of the 'digital jungle'. My brand was built to be the answer to that problem.

socio.title: Your Digital Partner
features: Stays by your side for 12 months

hub.title: Everything Your Business Needs
hub.content: It doesn't matter what stage you're at. From creating your first professional website to scaling your authority in the market. I have a solution designed for every stage of your growth.

featureCards.title: Strategic Web Design
featureCards.description: Your digital foundation. An ultra-fast (WPO 99) and professional website. Access the exclusive welcome offer with a 90% discount.

featureCards.title: Strategic Packs
featureCards.description: 'All-in-One' solutions. We unify maintenance, analytics, and strategy so you can focus solely on producing.

featureCards.title: Your Digital Partner
featureCards.description: No intermediaries. I am José Javier Sanahuja. See my certifications and a promise of real support.

featureCards.title: Blog & Strategy
featureCards.description: Resources, guides, and tactics on Local SEO and WPO. Continuous learning to dominate your market in the Canary Islands.

trust.title: Trust Earned, Not Given
trust.content: My reputation is based on results. With over 108 certifications and a perfect score on global platforms, my commitment is real.

proofCard.quote: «José is an incredible professional. Not only is he technically brilliant (WPO 99), but he becomes part of your team. He is a true partner.»

testimonials.name: Joaco B.
testimonials.content: He was very attentive and kept a close eye on the questions and revisions I had for the order. Highly recommended.

testimonials.name: Alerco
testimonials.content: The relationship with José Javier and his work are extraordinary.

testimonials.name: ihatemyclass
testimonials.content: Fantastic work! Even though I didn't express my availability at the start, they did an excellent job.

testimonials.name: Fengjason
testimonials.content: This is my second order with Mr. José, a really great experience.

testimonials.name: Thomas 8.
testimonials.content: Excellent service provider. Very happy with the communication and general knowledge.

ctaFinal.title: Let's Start Building Your Digital Future
ctaFinal.content: Shall we talk? Fill out the initial form and let's define together what success means to you. No beating around the bush, no abandonment.
ctaFinal.subtext: Your success is my success. Let's start today.
